channel.title: Teams on Newsboat Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Teams on Newsboat Blog

item.title: Shipping the Small Cut
item.description:
Defaults are where trust accumulates. Make the safest option the easiest.

Fewer surfaces, fewer surprises. Keep the path short and the intent obvious.

Keep the system small enough to see. When every step is visible, the next decision is easy.
